name: Memes 2 - We All Cry: Electric Boogaloo
name_original: Memes 2 - We All Cry: Electric Boogaloo
description:
The long-awaited sequel of memes - we all cry! This time, we tied all the nonsense of the first game into a story- hopefully this doesn't deter your experience with memes - we all cry!

Made with Renpy and available for PC, Linux, Mac, and Android.
